name: verify-changed-files
description: GitHub Action to check if files have changed and output the results

scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts -o dist && echo '// This file is autogenerated. Do not edit manually. Run `npm run build` to regenerate.' | cat - dist/index.js > temp && mv temp dist/index.js
scripts.all: npm run test && npm run build

author: MongoDB <info@mongodb.com>
